items.sentence: I've been spending a lot of time at home recently.
You don't have to spend a lot to have a good time.
Are you going to spend the rest of your life here?
Tom and Mary plan to spend time together tomorrow.
You need to spend quality time with your children.
Tom spent a lot of money when he was in Australia.
It would be better if you didn't watch so much TV.
We used to eat a lot of potatoes when I was a kid.
Do you think you could help me solve this problem?
I doubt that Tom would ever be allowed to do that.
I don't think that Tom works as hard as Mary does.
I looked out the window, but I didn't see anybody.
Tom said that he hasn't seen Mary for a long time.
I have literally no idea who you're talking about.
I think that can be the case with a lot of things.
I don't know what happened when I was unconscious.
I had a feeling something bad was going to happen.
I placed the medicine out of the children's reach.
I don't want to work at a fast-food place forever.
I thought nothing could go wrong, but I was wrong.
I must be the only one who isn't feeling that way.
I shot the horse because it had trouble breathing.
I try to spend as much time as I can in Australia.
Have you ever made more than $30,000 in one month?
Tom bought his son a car for a graduation present.
I don't think that I can repair this refrigerator.
The numerical simulations weren't accurate enough.
After some further research, I solved the problem.
I don't think that mobile phones can cause cancer.
Tom thought Mary was going to try to kill herself.
I doubt Tom can do that unless somebody helps him.
About how many times a day do you wash your hands?
Tom got jealous when he saw Mary with another man.
My car is very old, but it still runs fairly well.
Do you know the difference between silver and tin?
If I drop out of contact, let the police know, OK?
You'll need to stand in line to buy those tickets.
I thought Tom was supposed to be your best friend.
I was surprised that Tom agreed to Mary's demands.
I was planning to go there by bike, but it rained.
I didn't know that we weren't supposed to do that.
My two strongest languages are French and English.
I prefer not to eat meat because I'm a vegetarian.
There's a delicious smell coming from the kitchen.
Tom was standing in the middle of the living room.
I went to Boston when I was a high school student.
I like to watch sports on TV, especially baseball.
Tom married his ex-wife's older sister's daughter.
We're waiting for Tom to tell us it's OK to start.
I think that that guy looks a little bit like Tom.
